title: Ham & Stilton Pasta Bake
ingredients: ['2 handfuls Ham, cubed', 'Cooked pasta (however much you would normally use for 4 people)', '1 small portion (I used approx 150g) Blue Stilton, crumbled or cubed', '30ml Double Cream', '30ml milk', 'Large Knob butter', '150g Strong cheddar cheese - grated', '1/4 teaspoon Dried Chilli flakes', 'a few drops Tabasco Sauce']
